01 Oct 2020

Today was not particulary productive in regards to studying. Most of the day was spent making preparations for our camping trip to San Onofre State Beach.

  • I did start working on Chapter 16 Example: Pattern Matcher from Simply Scheme. I completed the first part of the chapter and started on the exercises, of which I completed the first and started the second.

  • I also worked on getting vim setup in VScode. This included getting extensions and setting up windows to swap CAP LOCK and ESC keys

  • VIM tip of the day: To ensure there is a blank line between your paragraphs, you can add the html tags for a paragraph: 
    *paragraph one*

<p></p>

*paragraph two*

    There may be a more elegant way to do it, but this works!
